nodes.bodyText:
I copied them for the implementation of the impertive version.
this method is really big and complex so the comments help me to maintain it yes ...
I personally do not see if they add any value.. upon arriving here the loop tells me that an iteration is going on..same for the one below about reflection registration.
While I also don't think this particular comment adds much value, I think it's way overkill to ask people to put less comments. In general comments are good and should be encouraged.
